name: contact_us
description: Business contact information | USE: contact us, contact information, business address, phone number, email, reach us | NOT: product promotion, job posting, holiday greeting

samples.tagline: Feel free to reach out to us!

fieldPrompt.background_image_url: Enter URL for the background architectural image
fieldPrompt.custom_css: Optional: Enter custom CSS to override/extend default styles
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: Enter custom HTML to replace the default template structure

components.html_content:
${brand_name}
${main_heading}
${tagline}
${phone}
${contact_email}
${website_url}
${address}
${custom_html}
